Package fr.cnrs.iees.properties

Interface ExtendablePropertyList

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, fr.ens.biologie.generic.DataContainer, PropertyListGetters, PropertyListSetters, ReadOnlyPropertyList, ResizeablePropertyList, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Sealable, SimplePropertyList, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Sizeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ExtendablePropertyListImpl
public interface ExtendablePropertyList extends SimplePropertyList, ResizeablePropertyList, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Sealable

A mutable SimplePropertyList, i.e. which can grow and shrink.

The contract is as follows: add...() methods will add a new property to the list while set...() methods will only set a value for an existing property. They should return an error if the property does not exist.

Instances of this class are Sealable, i.e. they can be made immutable after some time by calling seal(). This enables, for example, to read properties from a file without knowing how many are expected, and then make the property list immutable after the file has been closed.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 29-8-2017
